text: Virgilio Ferrari with black coat in 1957 Virgilio Ferrari (9 March 1888 – 12 June 1975) was an Italian Democratic Socialist Party politician. He was mayor of Milan. He was appointed Knight Grand Cross of the Order of Merit of the Italian Republic. ==References== Category:20th-century Italian politicians Category:Knights Grand Cross of the Order of Merit of the Italian Republic Category:Italian Democratic Socialist Party politicians Category:Mayors of Milan Category:Knights Commander of the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany Category:1888 births Category:1975 deaths
title: Virgilio Ferrari
